article_title: Authorities: Co-Pilot Took Control of Ethiopian Airlines Plane, Wanted Asylum
article_text:
The co-pilot of an Ethiopian Airlines jet was arrested on Monday after forcing the Rome-bound aircraft to land in Geneva in a bid for asylum in Switzerland, authorities said.

The co-pilot, identified by Ethiopian officials as 31-year-old Haile-Medhin Abera Tegegn, shimmied down a rope from the cockpit window before Swiss police took him into custody on the tarmac shortly after 6 a.m. local time. The airport reopened two hours...

twitter.description: An Ethiopian Airlines jet en route from Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, to Rome was hijacked Monday and forced to land in Geneva, authorities said.
twitter.creator: @martafalconiWSJ

image.alt: Authorities: Co-pilot took control of Ethiopian Airlines plane, wanted asylum.

The co-pilot of an Ethiopian Airlines jet was arrested on Monday after forcing the Rome-bound aircraft to land in Geneva in a bid for asylum in Switzerland, authorities said.
